actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Military Forces and Personnel.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Military Forces and Personnel

official_title: Expressing the sense of the Congress that the President should award a medal of honor to Wayne T. Alderson in recognition of acts performed at the risk of his life and beyond the call of duty while serving in the United States Army during World War II.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that the President should award a medal of honor to Wayne T. Alderson in recognition of acts of heroism while serving in the U.S. Army during World War II.

titles.title: Expressing the sense of the Congress that the President should award a medal of honor to Wayne T. Alderson in recognition of acts performed at the risk of his life and beyond the call of duty while serving in the United States Army during World War II.
